lines.text: I'm going to tell you the truth.
[but she then gives a different reason for being there each time]
I'm going to tell you the truth.
Opens the door with invisible hands and vanishes.
Don't be silly. How can you vanish if you're invisible? If you're invisible you're vanished before you've started.
He's a good boy when he is normal.
Ah, when he's normal. But he ain't normal. I mean, he has these come and go fits; when they come, somebody goes.
